column4: ok - i'm reinstalling :(. I give it one more go, and if it messes up again i give up like i did with Mandrake....  and then go back to windows. The force is always pulling newbies back to windows....
yeah :( ...  my ISP supply it free with new customers
Just coz it's free from the ISP doesn't mean you can't run your own, self-bought, ethernet dsl modem instead.
